mapper.sql: id, code, name, pCode, pId, url, icon, isMenu, level, fullCode, fullName, priority, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_auth_module
code = #{map.code},
name = #{map.name},
pCode = #{map.pCode},
pId = #{map.pId},
url = #{map.url},
icon = #{map.icon},
isMenu = #{map.isMenu},
level = #{map.level},
fullCode = #{map.fullCode},
fullName = #{map.fullName},
priority = #{map.priority},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_auth_module
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND pCode like CONCAT('%', #{pCode} , '%')
AND pId like CONCAT('%', #{pId} , '%')
AND url like CONCAT('%', #{url} , '%')
AND icon like CONCAT('%', #{icon} , '%')
AND isMenu like CONCAT('%', #{isMenu} , '%')
AND level like CONCAT('%', #{level} , '%')
AND fullCode like CONCAT('%', #{fullCode} , '%')
AND fullName like CONCAT('%', #{fullName} , '%')
AND priority like CONCAT('%', #{priority} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
